data.description:
OceanCraft is a Virtual Reality game about surviving on a self build vehicle on the ocean.

Survive the dangers of the ocean - alone - or with your friends.

!!! Early-Access Release !!!

Currently you have about three hours of gameplay

We are gradually adding more and more content around our core game mechanics – crafting – surviving and mulitplayering.

There is already a lot to do inside OceanCraft:
-	Survive alone or with your friends (cross platform multiplayer)
-	Collect trash from the ocean
-	Build you own base with pallets, walls, tables, chests, etc.
-	Grow and harvest plants
-	Fish fish with your fishing rod
-	Cut and grill fish and vegetables
-	Craft multiple helpful or decorative items and tools
-	Have multiple different save games/build vehicles
-	Play private games with your friends, or open a public game and connect with other OceanCrafters
-	Ingame voice chat
-	Fight against hunger and thirst
-	Collect materials by shooting balloons with your slingshot
-	Find

changelog.change_log:
New Locomotion
A lot of people kept asking us for different movement methods in OceanCraft
finally the waiting has an end!

You can now choose between different movement and rotations options:
Smooth locomotion, smooth rotation, snap rotation, teleport with snap turning

Additionally we added a dominant hand feature - because you can't always be right...


The Dolphin

This cute buddy helps you through your first steps in the world of OceanCraft and tells you how to move and how to use the hook.

Additionally we introduced Tasks/Missions to guide through most of the possibilities you already have within OceanCraft - they are optional ... so ignorance is ok, too!



New Stuff in version 0.4.x
--------------------------
+ Added new Locomotion methods: Smooth locomotion, smooth rotation, snap rotation, teleport with snap turning
+ Added dominant hand features
+ Added tutorial buddy "the dolphin"
+ Changed tutorial system to tasks
+ New Tool selection - circular menu when holding button
+ New Tool selection - quick change to hand and last tool when short pressing button
+ Removed special tool slots in inventory
+ New Missions / Tasks / Tutorials in menu
+ Reworked Menu UI
+ Improved placement behaviour (specially for stairs)
+ Added sounds to grill and purifier
+ Changed Input System / Improvements for Knuckles users

Fixes
--------------------------
+ Fixed issue #27 "Duplication Glitch"
+ Fixed issue #22 - Wood in water purifier renewed after re-building
+ Fixed issue #23 "Water boiling (again)"
+ Fixed issue #26 "I copied someone's island"
+ Fixed issue where destroyed stairs did not return box
+ Fixed issue where item rested on crate instead of getting into
+ Fixed hook speed differences on different platforms
+ Fixed some networking problems.. now: less disconnects
+ Fixed default selected region
